Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi bayojikeleza phakathi kwabo abafana bangunaphakade, uma ubabona ucabanga ukuthi bawubuhlalu obuhlakazekile
Futhi uma ubheka (esivandeni ezulwini) uzobona injabulo nombuso omkhulu

Phezulu kwabo kuyokuba yizingubo zikasilika ezicolisisekile eziluhlaza nendwangu ehlotshiswe ngokugqamile futhi bayohlotshiswa ngamabhengela esiliva futhi iNkosi yabo iyobaphuzisa isiphuzo esihlanzayo
Ngempela lona ngumvuzo wenu futhi ukuzama (ukuzabalaza) kwenu kuyobongeka (kwamukeleke)
Ngempela thina sayembula kuwena iQur’an kancane kancane
Ngakho-ke bekezelela umthetho weNkosi yakho futhi ungamhloniphi phakathi kwabo oyisoni noma ongakholwa
Futhi khumbula igama leNkosi yakho (thandaza) ekuseni nakusihlwa
Kanye nasebusuku uyikhothamele (uyiguqele) futhi uyidumise ubusuku obude
Ngempela laba bathanda okwamanje (impilo yalomhlaba) bashiya ngemumva kwabo usuku olunzima
Thina sabadala saqinisa isimo sabo futhi uma sithanda singabashintsha ngabafana nabo ukubashintsha okuphelele
Ngempela lokhu yisikhumbuzo, ngakho-ke noma ngabe ngubani othandayo akathathe indlela eya eNkosini yakhe
Futhi angeke nithande ngaphandle kokuba uma ethanda uMvelinqangi, ngempela uMvelinqangi ngasosonke isikhathi uyisazi unobuhlakani
Ungenisa lowo amthandayo emseni wakhe futhi izoni wazilungiselela isijeziso esibuhlungu
Futhi khumbula ngenkathi izulu lidatshulwa phakathi
Futhi yini ekwenza ukuthi wazi ukuthi luyini usuku lokwahlulela
Ngakho-ke sanquma futhi singabanqumi abahle kakhulu
Asizange yini siwenze umhlaba ukuthi ube wumbuthela (kuwo na)
Futhi sabeka kuwona izintaba eziphakeme futhi saniphuzisa amanzi amtoti
Alikho ithunzi (alisithi ithunzi) futhi alisizi ekubhekaneni nelangabi (lomlilo)
Ngempela lona likhipha izinhlansi (ezinkulu) njengendlu enkulu eyinqaba
Futhi angeke banikezwe imvume yokuthi benze izaba
Lolu wusuku lokwahlulela, siniqoqile kanye nabasendulu
Ngakho-ke uma ninecebo lenzeni ukubhekana nami
Yidlani futhi niphuze (ngokuzanelisa) nangentokozo ngenxa yalokho enanikwenza
Ngempela, kanjalo sibanika umvuzo abenzi bokuhle
Yidlani	nizithokozise	okwesikhashana	ngempela	nina niyizigebengu
Ngakho-ke iyiphi inkulumo abayoyikholwa emva kwayo
